DataAccessObject

Class DAOCupcake

  • java.lang.Object
    • DataAccessObject.DAOCupcake

  • public class DAOCupcake
extends Object
    This class is responsible for accessing the database. There are various methods for retrieving data from the tables in the database, for writing new users and orders into the database, and for validating that user input matches the table entries (for email and password).
    Author:
    sn√∏vsen

    • Method Detail

      • loginAuthentication

        public User loginAuthentication(String email,
                                String password)
        Authenticates users email and password input.
        Parameters:
        email - not null
        password - not null
        Returns:
        User object to be used in session.

      • checkIfRegisterable

        public boolean checkIfRegisterable(String email,
                                   String password)
        Checks users input (email, password). Checks that neither input is an empty string, and that email does not exist already in the database.
        Parameters:
        email - not null
        password - not null
        Returns:
        true if registerable

      • createUser

        public boolean createUser(String username,
                          String email,
                          String password,
                          int credit)
        Creates new user in database table 'users'. Writes user values to database.
        Parameters:
        username - not null
        email - not null
        password - not null
        credit - fixed to 50 for initial creation of user
        Returns:
        true

      • getAllBottoms

        public List<Bottoms> getAllBottoms()
        Reads all possible bottoms objects.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing all bottoms as objects with ID, name and price.

      • getAllToppings

        public List<Toppings> getAllToppings()
        Reads all possible toppings objects.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing all toppings as objects with ID, name and price.

      • getUsers

        public List<User> getUsers()
        Reads all User objects.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing all users as objects with username, email, password, credit, adminstatus and userID.

      • deleteUser

        public void deleteUser(int userID)
        Deletes a user from the database table 'users'.
        Parameters:
        userID - always 1 or higher

        Parameters:
        bottomsID - always 1 or higher
        Returns:
        Bottom object with id, name and price.

        Returns:

        Changes credit on user account.
        Parameters:
        user - not null
        credit - new creditvalue

      • addOrder

        public void addOrder(int price,
                     int userID)
        Adds order to the SQL database.
        Parameters:
        price - is calculated in the PlaceOrderServlet.
        userID - always 1 or higher. Is the ID of the user in the given session.

      • getOrderID

        public int getOrderID(int userID)
        Returns an int that represents a orderID based on a userID.
        Parameters:
        userID - always 1 or higher. Is the ID of the user in the given session.
        Returns:
        int orderID of the last order the user of the given userID made.

      • addOrderItem

        public void addOrderItem(int orderID,
                         int toppingsID,
                         int bottomsID,
                         int cupcakePrice,
                         int quantity)
        Inserts an orderitem to the database. All orderitems are attached to a specific order.
        Parameters:
        orderID - always 1 or higher.
        toppingsID - always 1 or higher.
        bottomsID - always 1 or higher.
        cupcakePrice - never supposed to be a negative number.
        quantity - always 1 or higher.

      • showOrdersForUser

        public List<Order> showOrdersForUser(int userID)
        Finds all orders for the given userID. The list is used to show the user all of her/his orders if there are any.
        Parameters:
        userID - given UserID of the UserID in the current session, always 1 or higher.
        Returns:
        returns List of Orders. Can be null. (If no orders are placed as of yet)

      • OrderDetailsUser

        public List<CupCake> OrderDetailsUser(int orderID)
        Returns a list of cupcakes, for a given orderID. This list is shown to the user, in his orderdetails.
        Parameters:
        orderID - this is the ID you give, to get the list of cakes for given ID. ID always 1 or higher.
        Returns:
        List of cupcakes.

      • AllOrders

        public List<Order> AllOrders()
        Makes a list of all orders in the SQL database.
        Returns:
        a list of all orders in the database

        public void updateTotalPrice(int price,
                             int orderID)
        Updates the total price of an order. Voidtype method that updates the total price of an order in the SQL database.
        Parameters:
        price - userinput
        orderID - is always 1 or higher.
